pageContext.claim: “Massive amounts of -- a large -- most of the drugs -- much of the drugs coming into our country come through the southern border in all different ways, much of it where we don't have walls.”
pageContext.analysis: Regardless of how Trump phrases it ("massive amounts," "large," "most of the drugs," "much of the drugs"), official reports from U.S. border authorities show that most drugs are smuggled into the United States through legal ports of entry, often hidden in vehicles or trucks.
